meanings.definition: Undergoes a transformation or change in form
meanings.sent1: The caterpillar morphs into a butterfly.
meanings.sent2: The tadpole morphs into a frog.
meanings.sent3: The pumpkin morphs into a carriage for Cinderella.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence morphs her into a fearless leader.
meanings.sent5: The chrysalis morphs the caterpillar into a beautiful butterfly.

meanings.definition: A sequence of images that represent gradual changes in shape or form
meanings.sent1: The animation shows the morphs from one shape to another.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a series of morphs to illustrate the transformation.
meanings.sent3: The morphs in the movie were so realistic, they made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: The morphs in the video game were like magic on the screen.
meanings.sent5: The morphs in the presentation captivated the audience with their smooth transitions.

meanings.definition: A distinct physical form or variety within a species
meanings.sent1: The bird with bright feathers is a unique morph within its species.
meanings.sent2: The new flower discovered is a rare morph of the common species.
meanings.sent3: The purple potato is a fun morph of the regular white ones.
meanings.sent4: The black sheep of the family is a rebellious morph in their group.
meanings.sent5: The giant panda is a beloved morph of the bear family.
